org.opensocial.explorer.specserver.api

Interface GadgetRegistry

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultGadgetRegistry

    public interface GadgetRegistry
    A registry of GadgetSpec objects. This is a static registry that provides no mechanisms for runtime changes to its contents.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GadgetSpec getDefaultGadget()
      Returns the default GadgetSpec object.
      GadgetSpec getGadgetSpec(String id)
      Returns information for a specific GadgetSpec given its id
      org.apache.wink.json4j.JSONArray getSpecTree()
      Returns a JSONArray tree representation of the gadget specs in the registry.

    • Method Detail

      • getDefaultGadget

        GadgetSpec getDefaultGadget()
        Returns the default GadgetSpec object. This is the gadget spec that will be rendered first on the client-side.
        Returns:
        the default GadgetSpec

      • getSpecTree

        org.apache.wink.json4j.JSONArray getSpecTree()
        Returns a JSONArray tree representation of the gadget specs in the registry.
        Returns:
        a JSONArray tree

      • getGadgetSpec

        GadgetSpec getGadgetSpec(String id)
        Returns information for a specific GadgetSpec given its id
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the GadgetSpec
        Returns:
        a GadgetSpec such that GadgetSpec.getId().equals(id)
